This app helps you find bars nearby bars, and their latest bar prices, in any part of the world. Perhaps you never knew that Bar X had such cheap drinks, so you try somewhere new. Perhaps you're in a new city, and don't even know where the bars are. BarFinder can help with both!
 
 The bar lists come from the great OpenStreetMap, and the pricings come from all the users in the world! If you don't see a bar on the list, visit www.openstreetmap.org and add it!
 
 More info at dbeer-services.ekta.is

This screen shows you a list of all known nearby bars, sorted by distance. The bar name, distance to the bar and the current average price for your favourite drink are shown. \n\n If you don\'t have a favourite drink, go to the preferences and choose one! If you click on a bar, you can see more detailed price history, add a drink price, show the bar on a map, or hide a bar you never want to visit.

This screen shows the full bar details, with average prices for all drinks on record. You can show the bar on a map, (one day) get directions to the bar, or hide the bar completely.\n \n If you\'re at (or close to) the bar, you can add a price for the bar, updating the prices for everyone!
